data.text: @TimothyCahalan @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice This sort of thing is why I refuse to read Buzzfeed.

@Absurd_Penguin @arena_funiculum @DavisNZAus @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @emmahusarmp @workmanalice West is Best blocked me , guess he didn't want me to see the incriminating evidence of his being "in on" the Emma slandering
No worries😁 I was about to block him anyway
@MiriamPossitani @arena_funiculum @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Think the term now is 'a pile on'

@arena_funiculum @DavisNZAus @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Not too sure who has a blinkered view here. Having accepted the fact there are two separate issues, your contention that Emma would leak against herself, and in such an appalling way, simply doesn't stack up. Someone she trusted - probably - and for mine, probably Jeremy Andersen
@Maintenonmadame @arena_funiculum @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice From two sources before publishing?
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Asked  twitter ystdy if journos still have to verify original info with another source before publishing. Is that still the case, do you know?

@Perorationer @arena_funiculum @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice He apparently helped the Independent candidate. Alice Workman shared his information as soon as Emma announced she wasn't coming back. Has history with the Dad Peter Anderson. Probably last one term. Then back to Labor maybe to Jeremy then.

@Perorationer @judyfree10 @TimothyCahalan @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Workman really doubled down on the Husar allegations it felt like she had some kind of personal relationship with her source & blindly believed them over Husar.

@arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I read those tweets again. Nobody said that. They said that journalists should check source allegations before spreading them.

@arena_funiculum @DavisNZAus @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @emmahusarmp @workmanalice If you're gonna be a smartarse, first you have to be smart. Otherwise you're just an arse.

@DavisNZAus @arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @emmahusarmp @workmanalice You can associate me with Emma in the fact that she stood up for herself, fronted Inquiries and was "got at" by a campaign of lies and innuendo

@NezJay @DavisNZAus @arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I think West is Best has a dog in this fight and won't have the guts to own up .

@NezJay @MiriamPossitani @DavisNZAus @arena_funiculum @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I have always thought journos needed at least 2 sources to publish, or has that gone by the bye n bye.

@MiriamPossitani @DavisNZAus @arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Let's hope he was made aware by a more credible source than Alice Workman's source. Because if not. . . It's probably also a load of bullshit.

Can "like" 3 comments and the question but the cat got his tongue before a response

Just a quick question, were you one of the complainants or have an association with a complainant?
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice A Warrior or a vigilante . . . ? She could argue she was doing her job when in fact she really wasn’t doing it well enough.

@arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Ive worked in politics, have degrees in politics. I’m not naive. Let’s agree to disagree.
@arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Oh I’m sorry this rationale isn’t credible. Believe what you want to believe.

@arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice You haven’t answered my question: how does Emma benefit by leaking these allegations?
@arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Logic in leaking ‘slut shaming’ allegations against oneself please???

@arena_funiculum @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice 2 Separate issues, Its the beat up, 'Sharon Stone'charge that did the real and permanent damage, and which proved to be the career killer for Emma. It was shown to be bogus and the complainant was not even in town at the time. Workman was sloppy. At best.

@arena_funiculum @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Fair enuf. So, he's an Agent for some Factional mate of his, or his Father's. Strange that almost identical charges (sans the Sharon Stone bit) had been levelled at his father Peter, in 2011 and were largely substantiated via ICAC

@arena_funiculum @Perorationer @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice This is about the allegations of how she allegedly behaved in front of Jason clare and his child not the bullying allegations

@arena_funiculum @Perorationer @TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Of course any staff member of ANYONE has the right to raise the issue if they believe they were victimised, and to do so with appropriate authorities.
This comment was about @workmanalice half arsed unsubstantiated and plain wrong in some cases, Media splurge

@TimothyCahalan @judyfree10 @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Yes @workmanalice owes it to @emmahusarmp to follow up on Andersen's family's involvement in this appalling affair, and expose Jeremy's pre-selection aspirations for Lindsay. Or at least she should, were both he, and his father Peter, not her main source. Someone should ask her.
@Zanukah @stephenmorphy11 @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice yep - otherwise generally known as LNP females #auspol

@TimothyCahalan @Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice .@barriecassidy could well have probed @workmanalice a little deeper, although the squirming and other body-language told the story sufficiently well. What the mind tries to conceal, the body finds a way to reveal.

@faully33 @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice @billshortenmp She didn’t do the research required for a top level journalist and now a woman’s career is destroyed. She should stick to less challenging subjects perhaps at a local suburban newspaper. At least until she learns the trade.

@Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice When pushed by Barrie Cassidy @workmanalice denied that she said it was Jason Clare and when he told her he had the article in front of him she just said her source was right even though we now know her source wasn't in Canberra. Makes for disgraceful journalism.
@DavisNZAus @PhilWaren @emmahusarmp @workmanalice She did and she is forever banished from my psyche and Twitter #antifeminist #aliceworkman #emmahusar #auspol

@Klaartu @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice @billshortenmp Nah,find out who the enabler was in Labor that fed the series of Leaks,Alice was a mule,this was a strategic move by someone powerful in Sussex St.
@Klaartu @emmahusarmp @workmanalice @billshortenmp Yes 100% but @emmahusarmp needs to feel she is ok within herself to do this.
@GoStuTweetz @DavisNZAus @jot_au @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Let’s hope not.
@MiriamPossitani @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Still NO excuse

@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Let’s ask @billshortenmp to request @emmahusarmp withdraws her resignation and then insist the ABC never invite @workmanalice on the Drum until she apologises for destroying reputations and undertakes a course in journalism.

@Klaartu @emmahusarmp @workmanalice She did good work prosecuting case against Cash, but then, like you, has lost my respect. Think she desperately wanted to join the big boys & girls on #Insiders couch. Overreached badly, incredibly sloppy. Yes @emmahusarmp pls reconsider

@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I no longer follow @workmanalice that was the sloppiest journalism I’ve come across since the last time I watched Ch10. Blithely destroying reputations & lives with no research she has suffered no consequences (apart from losing my respect) Despicable behaviour. Emma stay!!

@DavisNZAus @SophiaMcGrane @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Yes it's such a shame for a really good Woman and Politician. What gets to me is the double speak by her colleagues in the press. A disgrace all around.
@Zanukah @stephenmorphy11 @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Yes agree totally.

@DavisNZAus @SophiaMcGrane @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I remember that word obdurate when studying Geology and looking at the hardness of Quartz (hardness 7 on Moh's scale of hardness. Diamond is 10). Your usage is spot on. Slang usage for recalcitrant Journo = Thick as a brick.

@vogrady2132 @SophiaMcGrane @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Its devastating actually...a person's life has been utterly destroyed, yet Jeremy Andersen and Alice Workman walk away (tarnished) but not destroyed.

@DavisNZAus @SophiaMcGrane @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Isn't it really disturbing that @emmahusarmp has had her reputation completely trashed by one lowlife wannabe and assisted by a so called journalist.
@vogrady2132 @SophiaMcGrane @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Not that I have seen; in fact she's doubled down on her obduracy.
@DavisNZAus @SophiaMcGrane @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Is she even contrite?
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice She was just chasing an “exclusive” story, didn’t care about the damage caused along the way
@HeyfromChe @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Ambition drove her. But there is no accountability or consequence. In fact, she recently received industry award?
@AngryGranny1 @DavisNZAus @jot_au @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Destroyed her credibility and trashed the public trust in her work. Will end up a Liberal staffer.
@vogrady2132 @SophiaMcGrane @emmahusarmp @workmanalice No
@Urge29594909 @DavisNZAus @MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice She would be better suited for a job on today tonight or A Current Affair with the way she produced unsubstantiated allegations
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Your expecting to much. They don't check just get a sniff and go for the jugular. 😡😡😡
@DavisNZAus @SophiaMcGrane @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Has she apologised yet?
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Alice you stuffed this one up .. make amends
@cscviews @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice and workman had the hide to get upset when quizzed about it
@DavisNZAus @GayCarBoys @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Indeed ... still curious about this
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Can't coup, can't smear!  Can't run a country. What CAN they do?

@DavisNZAus @JohnEClements @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I don't understand why she included a specific allegation that obscene. Her position would've been highly dubious as the bullying & harassment allegations had strong grounds & the misuse of funds were being investigated.
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Correction...*Defamation.
@csmagor @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Oops. Yes. Sorry. Will have to go back and see what I put. I thought I had spelt it correctly. Hmm. Thanks for the correction.
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I agree
@uniqueliving4U @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice *defamation, but that too.
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Yesssssss. Alice. You did a sister.  Shame. Shame.

@DavisNZAus @profdmcinnes @emmahusarmp @workmanalice It pains me to say women journalists can be the worse offenders and you are NEVER going to get them to admit that, sadly. Women journalists mixed with women politicians makes potent explosives cocktails. Women rarely cut other women slack
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice No, she did a pretty good job butchering her own career!!
@Absurd_Penguin @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I don't assume they ever there for the people.
@MiriamPossitani @emmahusarmp @workmanalice But she was very "playable" because of her ambition
@Absurd_Penguin @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Journalists are a rare breed.This sorry lot are "opinion piece" writers
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice @workmanalice was played asnd used to carry out a foul deed
@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice If I was Emma, I would sue @workmanalice for defimation

@DavisNZAus @DunningKrugerP @emmahusarmp @workmanalice 'did the award-winning  @workmanalice bother to verify that ?' 

Nah..became willing 'player' herself...

Cassidy:'Clare said it didn't happen'
Workman:'That's not true..wasn't necessarily at Clare'
Cassidy:'I'm looking at your report,it says it was'

@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Let me add , there are three other MPS accused of similar things at the moment , I hope they get the same consideration before assumptions are made one way or the other 

Sometimes people  jump the gun and accuse  people in the public eye of misconduct without all the facts .

@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice As I’ve said so many times before , the allegations are easy to make and hard to defend . EH is on e of numerous people  sometimes unfairly accused of such behaviour
when the allegations are unfounded.
@DavisNZAus @jot_au @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Has Alice learned from her rookie mistake? I hope so!

@DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Most Journalists are not interested in truth or verifying facts. They are interested in influence and they work for the elites. That female journo wants influence. The 4th estate are there for not who you assume.

@Phil_B7 @DavisNZAus @emmahusarmp @workmanalice There is no excuse for releasing those allegations without a little investigation.  The most simple enquiries would have stopped the slut shaming in its tracks.  A female journalist particularly had an obligation to dig.  All too personal
@DavisNZAus @169lunar @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Jeremy Anderson was the complaint-ant and Peter Anderson was ‘the high ranking Labor insider’ - Alice got played.
@DavisNZAus @greensinspa @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Alice a dumb tool of the NSW Right.
@LushingtonBrady @DavisNZAus @wendoureeswans @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I apologise for last word. No need to be mean!!
@LushingtonBrady @DavisNZAus @wendoureeswans @emmahusarmp @workmanalice I think in this case I meant WIN the Election. Slease!

@LushingtonBrady @pastry212 @wendoureeswans @emmahusarmp @workmanalice You know what I appreciate your attempt to be witty, but I think sexualised puns are just very tired and so disproven in regard to @emmahusarmp
@pastry212 @wendoureeswans @emmahusarmp @workmanalice Yes totally
@DavisNZAus @wendoureeswans @emmahusarmp @workmanalice If Emma Husar ran for her old seat as a Independent she would romp in!!
